trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: O elemento associado a este par de automação.

trans-unit.source: The automation peer that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that holds the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" />.
trans-unit.target: O par de automação associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> que contém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The type name of the associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do tipo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> associado.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma enumeração de valor que especifica o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" /><see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que é compatível com o padrão de controle se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> é o valor <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />; caso contrário, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> into the visible region of the container.
trans-unit.target: Rola o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> para a região visível do contêiner.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider>.
